thread.title: Photos: Prez Mahama, others attend Theresa Kufuor’s 80th birthday
thread.title_full: Photos: Prez Mahama, others attend Theresa Kufuor’s 80th birthday

title: Photos: Prez Mahama, others attend Theresa Kufuor’s 80th birthday
text:
Former First Lady Theresa Kufuor turned 80 on Sunday, October 25. 
Several personalities, including President John Dramani Mahama, joined her to celebrate day. 
Apart from President Mahama, the mother-of-five, was also joined by her husband, former President John Agyekum Kufuor, her brother J.H. Mensah and former Defence Minister, Dr Addo Kufuor to mark the day at her Airport residence. 
John Kufuor and Theresa married in 1962. They were Ghana’s First Family between 2001 and 2008.
